text: Mbe satu surim, mba gumgi gum mbigi, mbe thivgiap kav Zisas garim, mben gumgir pani, mbe Zisas nzɨɨv khaŋ ana nzuai, “Ana harigi ntɨɨrir kurkurigi. Ana maaŋ muuŋgip ana guigira mba Fhe Bakɨme won ŋaarar muuŋv mba taagip khaŋ nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi ndir zav suaŋgiap farasarigi guma kɨp, ana maaŋ muuŋgip taagip wora kura.”
